question: 撮影禁止
sourceMnemonic: <ja>撮影</ja> is <kanji>photography</kanji>. <ja>禁止</ja> is <kanji>prohibition</kanji>. So if photography is prohibited, then we can assume there's a <vocabulary>no photos</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>no photos allowed</vocabulary> rule in place.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Will help to know the words <ja>撮影</ja> and <ja>禁止</ja>.
